Title: The jewish aramaic tombstones from zoar
Abstract: This article discusses the Jewish Aramaic tombstones from the cemetery of Zoar in the light of the new collection published as Yiannis E. Meimaris and Kalliope I. Kritikakou-Nikolaropoulou, in collaboration with Sebastian P. Brock, Inscriptions from Palaestina Tertia, volume Ic: The Jewish Aramaic Inscriptions from Ghor Es-Safi (Byzantine Zoora). Meletemata, 73; Athens: National Hellenic Research Foundation, 2016. 110 pp. + XXVIII plates. isbn 978 960 9538 46 6.
